try appname.localhost: just http://appname won't work because it won't point to your computer (dns)
and http://localhost/appname won't work because that's not how virtual hosts work (I think)
it may be that one of your virtual hosts is higher priority than whatever is looking /var/www

or created a higher priority one than the default
